title: cc菜单插件配置
author: caozheng2015
txt_content:

replies.author: tangxian
replies.txt_content:
menu-settings:

  # REQUIRED
  # Appears as the title of the menu.
  name: '&1**菜单 '

  # REQUIRED
  # The number of rows in the menu.
  rows: 6

  # OPTIONAL (you can remove this or set it to '')
  # Bind multiple commands using ; (command: 'menu; m; me')

  auto-refresh: 5

  # OPTIONAL
  # This command command will be executed when the menu is opened.
  # Supports all the icon command types.
  open-action: 'tell: &e你打开了**菜单.'

  # OPTIONAL
  # The menu will open only when right-clicking with a compass.


######################
#+                  +#
#       ITEMS        #
#+                  +#
######################


1:
  COMMAND:
  NAME: 
  LORE:
  ID: 
  DATA-VALUE: 
  POSITION-X: 1
  POSITION-Y: 1
这是我的菜单你可参考一下

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
caozheng2015 发表于 2019-7-20 14:09
我上传到一楼了
有这几个错误
1) The menu "cd.yml" doesn't have a name set.
2) The menu "cd.yml" doesn't have a the number of rows set, it will have 6 rows by default.
3) The icon "menu-setting" in the menu "cd.yml is missing POSITION-X and/or POSITION-Y.
1）菜单“cd.yml”没有设置名称。
2）菜单“cd.yml”没有设置行数，默认情况下它有6行。
3）菜单“cd.yml”中的图标设置缺少 POSITION-X 或 POSITION-Y 。
